title: Heritage North Carolina City Break in Heart of Winston-Salem with Recreation Complex
description: Historic Art Deco splendour meets legendary North Carolina hospitality at Kimpton Cardinal Hotel, an IHG Hotel, located in the heart of Winston-Salem’s vibrant downtown district. After days spent exploring the vibrant city, return to the hotel’s sumptuous lobby for an ice-cold glass of sweet tea, the onsite Rec Room for bowling and ping pong or head to Katharine’s for traditional French brasserie fare served with signature N.C. flair.
location_description: Kimpton Cardinal Hotel, an IHG Hotel
